required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Cross-Sectional Survey to Evaluate Diabetes Management, Control, Complications, Psychosocial Aspects of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes in Bangladesh, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Sri Lanka and Vietnam
clinical_study.official_title: A Cross-Sectional Survey to Evaluate Diabetes Management, Control, Complications, Psychosocial Aspects of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes in Bangladesh, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Sri Lanka and Vietnam

brief_summary.textblock: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this non-interventional study is to evaluate the current status of diabetes management, control, and complications in diabetic subjects in Vietnam.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Ecologic or Community, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients having HbA1c ((Glycosylated Haemoglobin) as measured during survey) less than 7%
primary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) of patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Postprandial Plasma Glucose (PPG) of patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)
Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)
Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)
Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients having cardiovascular complications
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients having peripheral vascular disease
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients having diabetic nephropathy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients having diabetic eye complications
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Evaluated at the first visit (only one study visit)

intervention.description: Patients will fill out a questionnaire by interview.

study_pop.textblock: People having been treated for at least a year are eligible for the study. The selection of the patients will be done randomly by the individual physician involved in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- People with type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM) who are being treated, with any of the non-pharmacological or pharmacological options, at a particular centre for at least 1 year and who have visited the centre within the last 3-6 months
- Patients willing to sign informed consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous participation in this study
- Unable to comply with protocol requirements
- Confirmed or suspected pregnancy
